data.title: Sales Assistant
data.description:
Story Teller / Sales Assistant

We are looking for a charismatic, charming and innovative Shop Assistant who can weave their magical touch to capture all audiences and to deliver the heartwarming stories behind Toddy at our newly opened outlet at The Marina @ Crossroads Maldives.

Scope of Work:
Responsible for welcoming customers into the shop. Explaining the stories behind the designs, interacting with the customers, making sales, and restocking the store. The main goal is to provide high class customer service and to increase brand’s growth and revenue through sales maximisation.

Specific Responsibilities:
·       Be able to capture the essence of each story behind the Toddy products and its designs.
·       Be innovative and adaptive in shaping and delivering the stories to the respective audience / customers.
·       Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent sales service.


Interested candidates please mail their resumes to info@weartoddy.com, along with educational certificates, a photograph and a copy of National ID Card.

company.name: Toddy Inc.
company.introduction: Toddy Inc. is a free-spirited 100% locally owned and operated apparel related company that seeks to tell the untold story of the Maldives through its unique t-shirts and souvenirs.

data.title: Associate-Audit &Assurance
data.description:
Work site: Head Office Male’
No. of Positions: 04
Required Qualification: GCE A’ Level

Main Responsibilities

•	Assist in planning, executing and completing audit engagements. 
•	Assist in completing audit working papers as per International Standards on Auditing and firm audit methodology. 

Knowledge & Skill Requirement
•	Should be interested in developing a career in auditing. 
•	Ability to work independently and meet challenging deadlines. 
•	Competency in English & Dhivehi language, written and spoken
•	Advanced knowledge of Microsoft office skills.
•	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
•	Must have a positive attitude, and the ability to work in a team environment with excellent interpersonal skills. 
•	Must be willing and able to travel across Maldives from time to time. 

Salary and Benefits
•	Total pay package MVR 7,500/month.
•	Opportunities for training and development.
•	Working Hours: Sunday- Thursday (8:00 hrs- 16:30 hrs)
•	All public and government holidays are non-working days. 

Please send your Send your CVs and related documents to  career@crowe.mv

Salary Range of MVR 5000 – MVR 7000
Other Benefits as per Company Policy

Application Address to:

Human Resources and Administration Department,
Rainbow Group of Companies, 1st Floor, G. Maarana, Alikilegefaanu Magu, Male’, Maldives or email to careers@rainbow.com.mv, For More Information Please Call: 3340450, 334040

company.name: Rainbow Enterprises Pvt Ltd
company.introduction:
Rainbow Enterprises Pvt Ltd (Rainbow) registered in Republic of Maldives in 1990 had its origin in the
building industry. The founding shareholders of Rainbow were the group who started the first
registered architectural and engineering firm (Tekton Design Associates Pvt Ltd) in the Maldives.
The main objective of Rainbow was to enter various businesses related to building industry and
therefore initially started trading in building materials and furniture. The company�s focus is to source
quality products and supply to the market at an affordable price. Rainbow owns various outlets in
Male� for selling its range of products and has a distribution network for selling to the outer islands of
the country.Over the years Rainbow diversified into related specialized areas through associated and
subsidiary companies. Therefore our goal is to become a market leader in delivering a wide range of
quality building products including those related to living solution to all the segments of the market.Rainbow Enterprises in partnership with its associated companies (Rainbow Group) will work as a
unified team to give a high quality service to the customers to achieve the group�s goal as a One Stop
Building Solution provider to the Maldives market.

data.title: Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
data.description:
JOB OPENING FOR CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER (CEO) 

Required Qualification & Experience:

• Bachelor's Degree in a related field. 
• Over 5 years of experience in Senior Management position. 

Key Competencies:

Professionalism:
• Adequate knowledge of Pension funds and/ or social security schemes 
• Excellent conceptual, analytical and innovative skills 

Innovation:
• Creative thinking and encourage team to be creative 
• Identify strategic issues, opportunities and risks, and inspire strategic direction for future possibilities 

Accountability:
• Takes ownership of responsibilities 
• Ensure timely delivery of objectives with efficiency and effectiveness, and operates in compliance with organisational law, regulations 

Decision Making:
• Identify key issues in a complex situation and always ensure decision making through impact assessment and rationale of good governance.

Leadership:
• Lead by example, ethical and role model with the organisation, to empower others to translate objectives and strategies in accom-plishments in an efficient and sustain-able manner 
• Hands on and value driven with conscious commitment at all times to lead with the values, connect them to organizational practices, and create an organizational culture that optimiz-es performance, accountability and contribution 
• Maintain a good relationship and coordination with internal and external stakeholders 

Detailed Job Description and Terms of Reference can be accessed from our website www.pension.gov.mv Interested candidates fulfilling the required qualifi-cations and competencies should submit their applications and relevant documents via email to bureau@pension.gov.mv or sealed in an envelope and labelled as "CONFIDENTIAL, & addressed as below:

Application for the Post of CEO of Pension Office Secretariat of Pension Office Board Maldives Pension Administration Office City Square (8th Floor), Chaandhanee Magu Male', Maldives 

Application Deadline: 14:00hrs of 8th December 2019 (Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted) 
Maldives Pension Administration Office, 8"' Floor, City Square, Chaandhanee Magu, Male', Maldives 
www.pension.gov.mv E1/pensionoffice N 1441 0+960 3309908 0 info@pension.gov.mv

data.title: Cargo Agent
data.description:
Requirements:

- Minimum 03 pass in GCE A’ Level including Math and English.
- Should be able to work under pressure and meet required deadlines.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Outlook, Word and Excel.
- Should be self-motivated and willing to undertake responsibilities.
- Excellent communication skills, Both English and Dhivehi.
- Candidates should enjoy working independently or with a team.
- Should be able to work in shift duty.
- Admin & Marketing experience is an added advantage.
- Candidates should have experience either in Airline cargo industry or relevant experience.
- Selected candidates will be required to join immediately.

Responsibilities:

- Promote Qatar Airways that is represented by the company.
- Prepare customer booking request on a daily basis and hand over to flight planner
- Prepare loading plan
- Maintain high level of service to the clients by providing feedback received from clients to immediate supervisors.
- Handling and monitoring outbound cargo operations
- Be present in the field while loading and monitor closely.
- Monitors and handle all incoming cargo
- Maintain high level of service to the clients by providing feedback received from clients to supervisors.
- Issuing and monitoring of Air waybills.

Remuneration Package: MVR 9300/- *depending on qualification, experience and attending duty.

Benefits included in the package: Food Allowance, Phone Allowance, Operational Allowance, Punctual Allowance

Other Benefits: Sales Incentive and Yearly Bonus

Applicants who meet the above requirements may apply with a complete CV, certificates, one passport size photograph, ID card copy, copies of references provided by previous employers before 16:00 hrs of 30th November 2019, in strict confidence to:

Human Resource Department
Cyprea Hotels and Travel (Pvt) Ltd.
66/17, Boduthakurufaanu Magu, Male’,Tel: 332 2451. Fax: 332 3523.
http: www.cyprea.com.mv, hr@cyprea.com.mv
Only shortlisted candidates will be informed.

company.name: Cyprea Hotels & Travels Pvt Ltd
company.introduction:
The Cyprea Group of Companies came into existence with the incorporation of Cyprea Pvt. Ltd. in 1978. Although it was established to serve as a travel agency, the company was formed on solid ground, its foundation laid on the budding tourism industry. The company was formed with a vision; a vision of leading the way, clearing the path for greater things to come.
The company from inception firmly focused on the travel and hospitality industry the company�s first milestone did not take long to reach. The company acquired Kanifinolhu in North Male� Atoll for the development of a tourist resort in 1979. Cyprea Hotels and Travel Pvt. Ltd. was formed to manage and operate the resort.
The newly formed company became the first IATA accredited travel firm in the Maldives.

data.title: SENIOR SALE EXECUTIVES / SALE EXECUTIVES
data.description:
Apollo Holdings Pvt Ltd is in search of young, energetic and enthusiastic individuals for the following posts.
1.	SENIOR SALE EXECUTIVES / SALE EXECUTIVES

Duties & Responsibilities:

•	Plan and prioritize sales activities based on the customer requirements
•	Manage the customer portfolios effectively
•	Maintain and develop existing and new customers through appropriate value propositions and ethical business practices
•	Plan and support marketing activities to integrate personal sales effort with organized marketing activities
•	Monitor and report market activities and provide relevant information and propose plans proactively. 

Key Requirements:

•	Minimum 2 years’ experience in corporate sales, sales or marketing
•	Excellent communication skills
•	CIM or any other relevant qualification will be an added advantage
•	Proven customer relation and management skills
•	Team player with the right attitude to do sales
•	Preference will be given to those who have experience in construction materials trade / Paints Electrical Items / Hardware

The successful candidates would be offered with a competitive remuneration package based on the qualification and work experience.
Interested candidates may forward your resumes stating the position applied for in the field to hr@apolloholdings.com.mv on or before 05th December 2019. For more information please contact 3335699
	
Human Resource Manager
Apollo Holdings Pvt Ltd
M.Marine Villa 2nd Floor, Varudhee Hingun,
Republic of Maldives
Email: hr@apolloholdings.com.mv

company.name: Apollo Holdings Pvt Ltd
company.introduction:
Apollo Holdings Pvt. Ltd. is a pioneer in the import & distribution of hardware & construction materials. After our inception in 1998, we have managed to run multiple businesses in Maldives. But still, the trading hardware and constructions materials remain our prominent business. We have strategic partners associated with us for local distribution and outbound logistics. We are a company you can bank upon for deliveries in any nook and corner of Maldives.
We love incorporating diversity in business and enjoy operating multiples niches under our renowned brand name. From 2008 onwards, we have put more feathers on our cap by investing in new opportunities and setting up new lines of businesses. The establishment of the water tank production plant in Maldives is one of the first initiatives in the country that have brought name and fame to our organization. With the initiation of plastic bag production plant, we have emerged as a business tycoon in the region. Our customer service centers have a presence across the country with prominent ones in Male�, Hulhumale�, S.Hithadhoo and GDh.Thinadho, etc. Our Thilafushi center supports the major activities of logistics, production and distribution in the region.

data.title: Accountant
data.description:
Six In One Private Limited is a newly established company commenced business on 2016. We are currently searching for dedicated, passionate, creative and committed candidate to fill the following vacancy. If you feel this position offers you the opportunities you seek to progress your career, then send your CV to the following email address.

General Requirements:

- Controlling the payroll
- Producing an accurate set of month-end accounts, with comparisons to forecasts and previous periods
- Preparing profit and loss accounts and the balance sheet for senior management
- Assisting in preparing budgets and business planning, including projected room revenue
- Reconciling bank statements
- Chasing late payments, reporting bad debts and keeping a careful eye on the cash flow
- Audit financial transactions and documents
- Comply with financial policies and regulations
- Report on the company’s financial health and liquidity
- Compute taxes and prepare tax returns
- Manage all accounting transactions

Interested candidates with proven experience are requested to submit their application together with complete CV, ID Copy to hrm.sixinonehotel@gmail.com on or before 12th December 2019. For further information contact our Reception @ 3301666.

If you feel this position offers you the opportunities you seek to progress your Career, then send your CV to the following email address.

data.title: Salesperson
data.description:
Please EMAIL applications to hisham@asrafee.com. Attach CV and copy of ID card, educational certificates, and reference letters.

Minimum requirements and qualifications:

- Age 18-25 years
- Completed GCE/GCSE O’ Level
- Have a pleasant personality
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- Able to take initiative and work independently
- Previous work experience in a similar field will be an advantage

Main Duties:

- Help customers find and decide upon which product to purchase.
- Gain knowledge of the products and provide demonstrations to customers.
- Be aware of special promotions, discounts, etc. and convey such information to customers.
- Arrange items on display shelves, maintaining them in presentable order.
- Prepare and count items for delivery or transfer.
- Maintain work area clean and tidy.

company.name: City Investments Pvt Ltd
company.introduction: City Investments (Pvt.) Ltd was found in 2005, three years after the establishment of our City Bakery, which is still at the heart of our business. Initially set up as a small bakery shop in the capital island Male�, City Bakery has expanded to be one of the biggest bakeries in the country. The successful growth of the business depended on innovative ideas, a passion for quality and consistency in delivering fresh products to the community. Today, City Investments has expanded its scope to include a restaurant, a fast food caf�, 3 bakery sales outlets and City Gelato under its umbrella. We are also a leading importer/distributor of high quality internationally recognized bakery ingredients, drinks, gelato bases, an organically and botanically brewed drink brand, spring water and innovative hygiene products.

company.name: Fantasy Pvt Ltd
company.introduction:
Fantasy Private Limited under the flagship of Ibrahim Rasheed has become synonymous with quality and has been serving the Maldivian hospitality industry for the past 19 years with a well managed and professional team. Today Fantasy supplies to nearly all the high class tourist resorts in the Maldives such as Conrad, One&Only group of resorts, Anantara Maldives, Four Seasons Resorts in Maldives, Soneva Resorts & Six Senses Spa, W Retreat and Spa just to name a few.
We take pride in being the trusted leader in the market and source the very best of the finest food from across the globe and supply it to our customers in the finest condition. Our distribution network is supported with cold storage�s, warehouses and a fleet of temperature-controlled vehicles � another first in the Maldives.

TTS is an equal opportunity employer.

company.name: Palm Tree Marine Pvt Ltd
company.address: M. Angelica, Fareedhee Magu, K. Male'
company.introduction:
Palm Tree Marine Pvt Ltd has been engaging in trading business in the field of marine, industrial and power generation for more than 20 years in the Maldives. During these years, we have created a benchmark for the market by launching state of the art products which are suitable for our customers.

Palm Tree Marine Pvt Ltd is the proud authorized dealer in Maldives for several esteemed brands in the global marine industry including Perkins, John Deere, MAN Energy Solutions, FG Wilson, Twin Disc, Guidi, Force Professional Tools, R&D Marine, SEC Batteries, and Alamarin Water Jet.

Apart from this, we also offer our customers with a variety of products from well-known brands such as Racor Filtration, JCS Hi-Torque, Golight Inc., and Rislone.

We also have our own service center which provides after sale services to our customers. Our service center is operated by a team of highly skilled engineers and technicans who are armed with the latest equipment in order to diagnose problems efficiently.

company.name: Novelty Printers & Publishers Pvt. Ltd.
company.mission: to give the best service to our customers
company.introduction: The company was founded in 1965 as a home business by Mr. Ali Hussain using a hand operated cyclostyling machine for printing, shaving razor blades for cutting paper and an old sewing machine for perforating. Manual stencil to letterpress to offset printing, the company has evolved in sync with every major advancement in the printing industry.Today its is the nation�s largest and leading provider of printing, publishing and related services with fully integrated production facilities that offer total solutions from concept design to finished product and everything in between.We produce quality products ranging from corporate stationary to full color brochures, books, posters, signboards, and billboards.

data.title: Senior Legal Officer
data.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES AND DELIVERABLES: 

1.	Act as an adviser to the contractor, check site works and maintain precise and regular journal of work progress.  
2.	Manage, monitor, interpret and explain the structural design and detail documents supplied by the concerned authority.
3.	Maintain constant liaison with the Contractor and their representatives (architects, surveyors and other technical staff) including attending regular meetings to ensure the pace of work progress.
4.	Identify and conceptualize social housing related construction projects in the Maldives.
5.	Manage the projects throughout the project life cycle: project initiation, planning, implementation, and closure; ensuring the achievement of the projects’ goals and objectives.
6.	Define accurate and detailed scope, objectives and deliverables for the projects.
7.	Ensure that the construction activities are carried out according to the plans, designs and drawings and ascertain accuracy of the qualities, quantities and proportions of the construction materials are precisely maintained. 
8.	Ensure that all materials used and works performed are in accordance with the specifications indicated in the contract document. 
9.	Prepare project structural details, project proposals, tender documents, implementation/work plans, progress reports, project reports and other documentation related to projects.
10.	Coordinate and manage the relationship with all the relevant project stakeholders effectively throughout the project life cycle.
11.	Develop and implement detailed and effective mechanisms to monitor and track projects and quality assurance
12.	Manage project budgets and meet budgetary objectives and make adjustments to project constraints based on financial analysis.
13.	Assist the staff during field surveys and site visits and provide guidance to the staff in carrying out the works effectively. 
14.	Review the operation and maintenance manuals submitted by the contractors; and provide guidance where necessary in establishing operation and maintenance procedures for the social housing projects.
15.	Assist and advice Project Implementation Unit in preparing and revising project activities and structural details and assistance when required by the Government and the relevant funding agency.
16.	Assist in the review/evaluation of project reports and documents.
17.	Perform other related technical tasks and duties as and when assigned by the Project Manager or Managing Director. 

REQUIREMENTS:

•	Completion of MQA Level 7 Qualification in Civil Engineering or related field.
•	Must have professional work experience in the field of civil engineering or a related field of at least five (05) years with minimum three (03) years field experience in a construction site management or construction site supervision role

Competencies:

•	Experience in strategic planning and risk management.
•	Experience in civil construction work under government health sector will be treated as an added advantage.
•	Proficiency in project management software, AutoCAD and Microsoft Office.
•	Highly organized and should be able to multitask.
•	Good interpersonal and communication skills.

A | 8B, H. Orchid, Ameer Ahmed Magu, 20095, Malé, Republic of Maldives
T | +960 3313244
E | info@fdc.mv

company.name: Fahi Dhiriulhun Corporation Limited
company.address: 8th Floor, H. Orchid, Ameer Ahmed Magu, Male, Maldives
company.introduction:
Fahi Dhiriulhun Corporation Limited is a 100% state owned company established by the Government of the Republic of the Maldives, with the primary objective of providing social housing to the citizens of Maldives, under Section 95 of the Maldives Constitution Act No 10/96 “The Companies Act of the Republic of Maldives” and with the President’s authority, by a Presidential Decree no 2/2019.
This newly established company will be mandated with the responsibilities of carrying out all works in providing shelter for the community at an affordable price, providing shelter to low-income earners at a subsidized rate, and providing capital for first time house buying individuals.

data.title: Dispatch Officer
data.description:
1. General office up keeping and maintenance of office premise.
2. Dispatching of office documents.
3. Performing general office clerk duties and errands
4. Collect quotations from suppliers/sellers and dispatch Purchase Orders.
5. Collect office purchases from suppliers/sellers as required.
6. Buy office items as instructed and required by the relevant departments.
7. Provide filing services and other office related documentation.
8. Maintaining supply inventory and orders.
9. Carry out miscellaneous administrative tasks
10. Provide office support to all the departments of the corporation.
11. Creating, maintaining, and entering information into databases.
12. Helping organize and maintain office common areas.
13. Manage and maintain pantry supplies.
14. Assist in setting up meetings and arranging refreshments.
15. Completing other tasks related to the work of the department assigned by the Supervisor

company.name: Fahi Dhiriulhun Corporation Limited
company.address: 8th Floor, H. Orchid, Ameer Ahmed Magu, Male, Maldives
company.introduction:
Fahi Dhiriulhun Corporation Limited is a 100% state owned company established by the Government of the Republic of the Maldives, with the primary objective of providing social housing to the citizens of Maldives, under Section 95 of the Maldives Constitution Act No 10/96 “The Companies Act of the Republic of Maldives” and with the President’s authority, by a Presidential Decree no 2/2019.
This newly established company will be mandated with the responsibilities of carrying out all works in providing shelter for the community at an affordable price, providing shelter to low-income earners at a subsidized rate, and providing capital for first time house buying individuals.

data.title: Quantity Surveyor
data.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES AND DELIVERABLES: 

1.	Preparing tender and contract documents, including bills of quantities with the architect and/or the client.
2.	Undertaking cost analysis for repair and maintenance project work.
3.	Assisting in establishing a client's requirements and undertaking feasibility studies.
4.	Performing risk, value management and cost control.
5.	Advising on procurement strategy.
6.	Identifying, analyzing and developing responses to commercial, technical or other risks. 
7.	Preparing and analyzing costing for tenders.
8.	Allocating work to subcontractors. 
9.	Providing advice on contractual claims. 
10.	Analyzing outcomes and writing detailed progress reports. 
11.	Valuing completed work and arranging payments. 
12.	Maintaining awareness of the different building contracts in current use. 
13.	Understanding the implications of health and safety regulations.
14.	Compare the drawings and the Bill of Quantities submitted to ensure that the values coincide.
15.	Check and prepare Bill of Quantities of buildings as well as other infrastructure assigned.
16.	Prepare Bills of Quantities required in the construction building and infrastructure works required for the project at the current market price. 
17.	Prepare Bills of Materials and Cost Estimates that reflect probable construction costs.
18.	Ensure that the construction activities are carried out according to the plans, designs and drawings and ascertain accuracy of the qualities, quantities and proportions of the construction materials are precisely maintained. 
19.	Review and agree on the quantity, quality and cost of the materials used for construction of the building by the Contractor.
20.	Advice in the tendering process including, procurement and contract negotiations stage.
21.	Assist and advice Project Implementation Unit in preparing and revising project activities and financial plans and when required by the Government and the relevant funding agency.
22.	Assist in the review/evaluation of project reports and documents.
23.	Assist and advice FDC in developing and reviewing proposals, concept and designs pertaining to construction projects and provide necessary comments and suggestions. 

REQUIREMENTS:

•	Completion of MQA Level 7 Qualification in Quantity Surveying or related field.
•	Civil Engineering/Quantity Surveying professional education certification with minimum 5 years of experience in the field. 

Competencies:

•	A proven track record of managing projects at various levels with accountability.
•	Able to confidently manage subcontractor accounts.
•	Understanding and knowledge of similar projects.
•	Highly organized and should be able to multitask.
•	Good interpersonal and communication skills 
•	Strong teamwork and interpersonal skills.
•	Excellent written and verbal communication 
•	Excellent research skills and presentation skills.
•	Strong analytical, problem-solving and conceptual skills.
•	Computer literate with excellent Microsoft software skills.


Interested candidates may submit the attached job application form with all required documents.


A | 8B, H. Orchid, Ameer Ahmed Magu, 20095, Malé, Republic of Maldives
T | +960 3313244
E | info@fdc.mv

data.title: Civil Engineer
data.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES AND DELIVERABLES: 

1.	Act as an adviser to the contractor, check site works and maintain precise and regular journal of work progress.  
2.	Manage, monitor, interpret and explain the structural design and detail documents supplied by the concerned authority.
3.	Maintain constant liaison with the Contractor and their representatives (architects, surveyors and other technical staff) including attending regular meetings to ensure the pace of work progress.
4.	Identify and conceptualize social housing related construction projects in the Maldives.
5.	Manage the projects throughout the project life cycle: project initiation, planning, implementation, and closure; ensuring the achievement of the projects’ goals and objectives.
6.	Define accurate and detailed scope, objectives and deliverables for the projects.
7.	Ensure that the construction activities are carried out according to the plans, designs and drawings and ascertain accuracy of the qualities, quantities and proportions of the construction materials are precisely maintained. 
8.	Ensure that all materials used and works performed are in accordance with the specifications indicated in the contract document. 
9.	Prepare project structural details, project proposals, tender documents, implementation/work plans, progress reports, project reports and other documentation related to projects.
10.	Coordinate and manage the relationship with all the relevant project stakeholders effectively throughout the project life cycle.
11.	Develop and implement detailed and effective mechanisms to monitor and track projects and quality assurance
12.	Manage project budgets and meet budgetary objectives and make adjustments to project constraints based on financial analysis.
13.	Assist the staff during field surveys and site visits and provide guidance to the staff in carrying out the works effectively. 
14.	Review the operation and maintenance manuals submitted by the contractors; and provide guidance where necessary in establishing operation and maintenance procedures for the social housing projects.
15.	Assist and advice Project Implementation Unit in preparing and revising project activities and structural details and assistance when required by the Government and the relevant funding agency.
16.	Assist in the review/evaluation of project reports and documents.
17.	Perform other related technical tasks and duties as and when assigned by the Project Manager or Managing Director.

REQUIREMENTS:

•	Completion of MQA Level 7 Qualification in Civil Engineering or related field.
•	Must have professional work experience in the field of civil engineering or a related field of at least five (05) years with minimum three (03) years field experience in a construction site management or construction site supervision role

Competencies:

•	Experience in strategic planning and risk management.
•	Experience in civil construction work under government health sector will be treated as an added advantage.
•	Proficiency in project management software, AutoCAD and Microsoft Office.
•	Highly organized and should be able to multitask.
•	Good interpersonal and communication skills.

Interested candidates may submit the attached job application form with all required documents.

T | +960 3313244
E | info@fdc.mv

data.title: Motorcycle Mechanic
data.description:
We are looking for motivated and capable candidates to join our team.

Position:
• Motorcycle Mechanic

Work site:
• Palm Tree Marine Service Center

Responsibilities:
•  Assemble motorcycle as detailed by the factory
•  Carry out general maintenance
•  Conduct motorcycle inspections
•  Overhaul the components as required
•  Conduct minor parts and accessories replacement
•  Diagnose issues related to the motorcycle

Qualifications and Experience:
•  Diploma in Engineering or any other relevant field
•  Minimum 1 – 2 years of experience as a motorcycle mechanic 
•  Basic computer skills
•  Fluent in speaking and writing in English and Dhivehi
•  Able to work in a team

Remuneration:
• Negotiable based on qualifications and experience

Interested candidates should email a copy of their CV, Educational Certificates, Identity Card and Employment Reference Letters to ptmarine@palmtree.com.mv

For more information, please contact 3312978 or 3337833

company.name: Palm Tree Marine Pvt Ltd
company.address: M. Angelica, Fareedhee Magu, K. Male'
company.introduction:
Palm Tree Marine Pvt Ltd has been engaging in trading business in the field of marine, industrial and power generation for more than 20 years in the Maldives. During these years, we have created a benchmark for the market by launching state of the art products which are suitable for our customers.

Palm Tree Marine Pvt Ltd is the proud authorized dealer in Maldives for several esteemed brands in the global marine industry including Perkins, John Deere, MAN Energy Solutions, FG Wilson, Twin Disc, Guidi, Force Professional Tools, R&D Marine, SEC Batteries, and Alamarin Water Jet.

Apart from this, we also offer our customers with a variety of products from well-known brands such as Racor Filtration, JCS Hi-Torque, Golight Inc., and Rislone.

We also have our own service center which provides after sale services to our customers. Our service center is operated by a team of highly skilled engineers and technicans who are armed with the latest equipment in order to diagnose problems efficiently.
